channel.title: tools on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in tools on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Castorama Logo
Castorama is a French retailer of DIY and home improvement tools and supplies, headquartered in Templemars, France, and is part of the British group Kingfisher plc, which has 101 stores in France, 76 in Poland and 20 in Russia. The company became a subsidiary of Kingfisher plc in May 2002, along with Castorama’s own subsidiary Brico Dépôt. Some outlets have been converted or relocated under the Brico Dépôt format ‘DIY Warehouse’, based on the B&Q Warehouse fascia in the United Kingdom.
You can download theCastoramalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Castorama
item.description: Castorama is a French retailer of DIY and home improvement tools and supplies, headquartered in Templemars, France, and is part of the British group Kingfisher plc, which has 101 stores in France, 76 in Poland and 20 in Russia. The company became a subsidiary of Kingfisher plc in May 2002, along with Castorama’s own subsidiary Brico Dépôt. Some outlets have been converted or relocated under the Brico Dépôt format ‘DIY Warehouse’, based on the B&Q Warehouse fascia in the United Kingdom.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Halfords Logo
Halfords Group plc is a British retailer of car parts, car enhancement, tools, camping and touring equipment and bicycles operating in the United Kingdom and Ireland. They also provide MOT, service and repairs in the United Kingdom, through Halfords Autocentre. Halfords Group is listed on the London Stock Exchange. A similar retail company, also called Halfords, exists in the Netherlands and Belgium. This only has historical ties to the British Halfords Group.
You can download theHalfordslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Halfords
item.description: Halfords Group plc is a British retailer of car parts, car enhancement, tools, camping and touring equipment and bicycles operating in the United Kingdom and Ireland. They also provide MOT, service and repairs in the United Kingdom, through Halfords Autocentre. Halfords Group is listed on the London Stock Exchange. A similar retail company, also called Halfords, exists in the Netherlands and Belgium. This only has historical ties to the British Halfords Group.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Screwfix Logo Screwfix is the United Kingdom’s largest multi channel retailer of trade tools, accessories and hardware products. Founded in 1979 as the Woodscrew Supply Company, the company was acquired in July 1999 by Kingfisher plc, which also owns B&Q, and is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Source
You can download theScrewfixlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Screwfix
item.description: Screwfix is the United Kingdom’s largest multi channel retailer of trade tools, accessories and hardware products. Founded in 1979 as the Woodscrew Supply Company, the company was acquired in July 1999 by Kingfisher plc, which also owns B&Q, and is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Toolstation Logo Toolstation is a multi-channel retailer of tools and building materials. It has more than 470 branches in the UK, 65 in the Netherlands and 23 in France. It was bought by Travis Perkins in 2014. The managing director is James Mackenzie. Source
You can download theToolstationlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Toolstation
item.description: Toolstation is a multi-channel retailer of tools and building materials. It has more than 470 branches in the UK, 65 in the Netherlands and 23 in France. It was bought by Travis Perkins in 2014. The managing director is James Mackenzie. Source
